data.title: My Life Without Me
data.meta_description: An emotional, beautiful, poignant and critically acclaimed drama that will stay with you long after the credits roll, about a young woman who conceals her terminal cancer so she can live her life with a passion she never had before. data.text: An emotional, beautiful, poignant and critically acclaimed drama that will stay with you long after the credits roll, about a young woman who conceals her terminal cancer so she can live her life with a passion she never had before. Starring Mark Ruffalo, Scott Speedman and Sarah Polley, My Life Without Me is a dignified, heartfelt drama that wounds on the inside where the scars feel fresh.
